title: paTTAbhiSEkam koNDaruLinAn
sahitya:
paTTAbhiSEkam koNDaruLinAn pAroDu viNNum muzhanga muzhanga paNNiya puNNiyam 
koDaiyoDu vazhanga kArenumEniyil vaNNam tulanga kAmadhEnuvuDan indran vaNanga


anupallavi

  eTTada paramporuL idO ena vandu engaL ayyan mEni mElE IrEzhu ulagam ellAm kuLira 
kuLira vaikkum inbamennum nilai pOlE aSTa dishai paravum airAvatak-karattAl AkAsha
gangaoyinAlE hari hari jaya vijayIbhava enum oli aNDamugaDupaDa karuNaiyinAlE


caraNam 1    vaTTa veNkuDaiyai candran piDikka vaNNa malargaL aLLi rambhaiyar teLikka 
iSTamuDan nandi bhErikai aDikka ezhilAgha mayilinam azhagODu naDikka
				(madhyamakAla)
ishai pADiDum gandharvar kinnarargaL izhaindu tandadai vINaiyil muDukka
ishaindu neLindu Adum vidyAdharar ezhiligaL koNDaiyil tIghaiyai muDikka
ashai maranda mALinam pEDugaL shila atishayam adil giri Adi kudikka
hari hari jaya vijayIbhava enum oli ANDamugaDupaDa AhAyam iDikka
    caraNam 2    tumbur nAradar gItangaL pADa kAdai tuLaikkudenrAyargaL karattinAl mUDa kaNNan 
vambivai AghAdenru jADai sheidu pODa kaNNA un vaNNak-kuzhalishaikku nErAdenru pADa 
maDi pozhiyum bAlamudinAl azhagu manam kavara kAmadhEnu sheyyum
mangaLAbhiSEkam kaNDa munivargaL manamoDu nirainda amudinaip-peyyum
toDiyiDai tuvaLuru nangaiyar mAdargaL turu turu ena gaNa vINaiyar kaiyum
tozhuda kaiyum urugumeyyum Agha mEgha turangan magizhndu sheyyum gOvinda
